      static java.lang.String SNAPSHOT_WITH_SSTABLE
      When true, snapshot lucene files with sstables.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​AbstractSearchStrategy> strategies  
      static java.lang.String SYNCHRONOUS_REFRESH
      When true, refreshes ES index after each update (used for testing).
      static java.lang.String SYSTEM_PREFIX  
      static java.lang.String TABLE_PREFIX  
      static java.lang.String TOKEN_PRECISION_STEP
      Lucene numeric precision to store _token , see http://blog-archive.griddynamics.com/2014/10/numeric-range-queries-in-lucenesolr.html
      static java.lang.String TOKEN_RANGES_BITSET_CACHE
      Enable the token_ranges bitset cache (cache the token_ranges filter result at the lucene liveDocs level).
      static java.lang.String TOKEN_RANGES_QUERY_EXPIRE
      Expiration time for unused cached token_ranges queries.
      static java.lang.String VERSION_LESS_ENGINE
      When true, use the optimized version less Elasticsearch engine.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ClusterService

        @Inject

                      ClusterSettings clusterSettings,

      • readMetaDataFromTableExtensions

        public MetaData readMetaDataFromTableExtensions​(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> metadataTableName)
                                         throws NoPersistedMetaDataException
        Scan CQL table extensions to build Elasticsearch metadata: - global metadata is located in elastic_admin.metadata extensions, with key = "metadata". The global metadata contains indices definition with no mapping (no keep index definition with no mapping). - each indexed table have an extension with a SMILE serialized IndexMetaData having only one mapping. When reloading an index table extension from the schema, mapping is added to the global index entry. If no global index entry exists, the one from the table level is used (when restoring CQL table with index+mapping definition)
        抛出:
        NoPersistedMetaDataException

      • addVirtualIndexMappings

        public MetaData.Builder addVirtualIndexMappings​(MetaData metaData)
        Add mapping on virtualized indices (scan all metaData).
        参数:

      • readMetaDataOwner

        public java.util.UUID readMetaDataOwner​(long version)
        Read owner for a given version, with CL=SERIAL to commit any remaining uncommitted Paxos state before proceeding with the read. Retry many times if a timeout occurs, because we have no other choice to recover from a PAXOS write timeout.
